text: mosega geu gigan-eul chaeugo geuui gajoggwa hamkke yeohaeng-eul hadeon jung-e ttuleusan banghyang-eseo bul-eul balgyeon hago geuui gajog-ege malhagil meomchu siyo naega bul-eul boassnani naega geugos-eulobuteo neohuiege sosig-eul gajyeoolila animyeon buldeong-ileul gajyeowa dangsin-i ttatteusham-eul neukkige halila
